title: Verify the eligibility of insurance of an event when the property "ticket.insurance.enable.during.hide.prices.redemption" and the event's "Hide Redemption Prices Externally" to TRUE.
custom_preconds:
Set the property "ticket.insurance.enable.during.hide.prices.redemption" and the event's "Hide Redemption Prices Externally" to TRUE.
Insurance Sales AFP permission set to TRUE.
Create normal event with Insurance permission.
Create event group.
Associate the event to the event group.
Create voucher event.
Associate the event, buyertype, payment method to voucher event.
Complete voucher sale transaction with Adult buyertype and print the tickets.
Note down the barcodes.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Log into the PV application with valid credentials
2. Navigate to Ticket Sales
3. Select the event and patron
Select the tickets and lock the seats

4. Select the delivery method
Select the payment method as Voucher Payment 
Add the barcodes and apply the payment
Set the Insurance and complete the transaction
5. Navigate to Ticket Services and verify the insurance provider
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login should be successful
2. Navigated to ticket sales page
3. Navigated to shopping cart page
4. Success - Transaction should be completed succesfully. Cart should be eligible for Insurance transaction.
5. Insurance provider should be displayed successfully
